name: about
title: About VolBrain
contents: The volBrain pipeline has been developed by **[José V. Manjón](#jvmanjon)** from *IBIME, UPV, Spain* and **[Pierrick Coupé](#pcoupe)** from *LaBRI UMR 5800, Université de Bordeaux, CNRS, France*.

The orginal Website was design by **Elena Carrascosa** and **[Jose E. Romero Gomez](#jergomez)**. The new platform was design by **[Xavier AMORENA](#xamorena)** and **[Floréal MONTSERRAT](#fmontserrat)**
We want to thank for their help:
